an4.137:1.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.137:1.3: One person doesn’t value or submit to ethics, immersion, or wisdom.
an4.137:2.1: One person values and submits to ethics, but not to immersion or wisdom.
an4.137:3.1: One person values and submits to ethics and immersion, but not wisdom.
an4.137:4.1: One person values and submits to ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
an4.137:4.2: These are the four people found in the world.”
